means: 移动，用策略( maneuver的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: This Manstein did , with some brilliant maneuvering under the worse winter conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 曼施坦因在最恶劣的严冬条件下, 出色地施展了灵活机动的战术,终于完成了任务.

sentence.Network_en: In short, large goals required farsighted policies, not tactical maneuvering.
sentence.Network_cn: 一句话, 大的目标需要有高瞻远瞩的政策, 玩弄策略是不行的.

sentence.Network_en: While talking, he changed freeway lanes , maneuvering the Fiat with one hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一边讲话, 一边用一只手开着菲亚特离开了高速干道.
